title: John Layfield
summary: John Charles Layfield (born November 29, 1966),[1] better known by the ring name John "Bradshaw" Layfield (abbreviated JBL),[2][4] is an American businessman, television personality, and retired professional wrestler signed to WWE. Layfield is currently a financial commentator featured regularly on Fox News Channel and Fox Business Network.  He is also employed by Northeast Securities as its Senior Vice President.[8]
